statements: UPDATE pharmaceutical_patent_litigation_history SET lawsuit_description = 'Patent infringement', court_decision = 'Settled', settlement_amount = 50000 WHERE patent_id = 'b9b7610a-3935-4c88-8a78-2e673186d398';
